issue.title: [C++] Doc build broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4417](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4417). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/485716603#L4746

```Java

/home/travis/build/apache/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernel.h:170: error: The following parameters of arrow::compute::UnaryKernel::Call(FunctionContext *ctx, const Datum &input, Datum *out)=0 are not documented:
  parameter 'ctx'
  parameter 'input' (warning treated as error, aborting now)
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4417?focusedCommentId=16754926) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3521
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3521>
